# seqera_workspace_participant (Data Source)

Look up a workspace participant by email.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String) Email address of the participant to look up.
- `org_id` (Number) Organization numeric identifier.
- `workspace_id` (Number) Workspace numeric identifier.

### Read-Only

- `first_name` (String) First name of the participant.
- `last_name` (String) Last name of the participant.
- `member_id` (Number) Organization member numeric identifier.
- `participant_id` (Number) Participant numeric identifier.
- `role` (String) Role of the participant in the workspace.
- `user_name` (String) Username of the participant.
